externalDocs.description: Find out more about Easyship API

post.summary: Create Action for a Shipping Rule
post.description:
Create an action for a shipping rule.

Required authorization scope: `enterprise.shipping_rule`

> This API is currently in **beta** and is available upon request. Get in touch with your account manager or Easyship Support Team to enable it.

parameters.name: shipping_rule_id
parameters.description: Shipping Rule ID provided when creating

details: Automation action  is not a valid action
error.message: The request body content is not valid.

post.description:
Switch a specific child company to the free-tier subscription plan.
The free-tier plan takes effect upon expiration of the current plan period.

Required authorization scope: `enterprise.company`

200.description: subscription successfully switched to free plan

default.summary: subscription successfully switched to free plan

error.message: The requested resource was not found.

parameters.name: easyship_company_id
parameters.description: Easyship Company ID

get.description:
Retrieve a list of organizations (groups of child companies) that are a part of your group.

parameters.description: Page number to fetch, default: `1`

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of records per page to fetch, default: `20`

parameters.description: Organization ID provided when creating the organization

Retrieve details of a specific organization (group of child companies) in your group.

Update a specific organization (group of child companies).

Required authorization scope: `enterprise.organization`

delete.description:
Delete an organization (group of child companies) from your group.
An organization can be deleted only when there are no companies in it.

scopes.enterprise.child_companies_access: Allow accessing child companies under the Public API (Enterprise API)
scopes.label: Labels API (Public API)

shipping_rule_platform_list.description: List of plaforms for Shipping Rules

request_id.description: An unique ID represent the request.

line_1.description: First line of the street address

line_2.description: Second line of the street address

state.description: State, Province, or other top-level administrative region. Mandatory for some countries (AU, CA, CN, MX, MY, US). Ideally, use the abbreviations (2 letters for US/CA, 2/3 letters for AU).

postal_code.description: Postal code. Mandatory for most countries (if not applicable, for example Hong Kong, leave null or 0)

contact_name.description: The full name of a person at the address. Owner name will be used if not provided.

contact_phone.description: Phone number used to reach the person in contact_name (may or may not be SMS-ready).

never_courier_ids.description: List of courier IDs based on Courier API

preferred_courier_ids.description: List of courier IDs based on Courier API

incoterms.description:
"DDP": "Pre-paid (included in shipping cost)"
"DDU": "Post-paid (not included in shipping cost)"
"DDU_and_Best_DDP": "Offer 3 post-paid and 1 pre-paid shipping options (for checkout only)"
"DDP_and_Best_DDU": "Offer 1 post-paid and 3 pre-paid shipping options

ActionForceSortBy.description: Sort couriers by total_charge, delivery_time_rank or value_for_money_rank

sort_by.description:
total_charge: Cheapest
delivery_time_rank: Fastest
value_for_money_rank: Best value for money

ActionForceTrackingRating.description:
Filter couriers by tracking quality

**Note:** this option is very restrictive and you may not see rates. Please make sure to verify the items selected.

force_tracking_rating.description:
List of tracking ratings to use

For example: to filter out couriers with `limited` or `basic` tracking you'd set `force_tracking_rating` to `[2, 3]`

force_box_id.description: Box ID based on Box API. Box type is 'box'.

force_flat_rate_box_id.description: Box ID based on Box API. Box type is 'flat_rate_box'.

never_package_ids.description: Box IDs based on Box API.

origin_address_id.description: Address ID based on Address API.

ActionAddForcedDeliveryTime.description: Restrict courier services based on delivery time

operator.description: Operators for comparison include less than (<), less than or equal to (<=), greater than or equal to (>=), and greater than (>)

created_at.description: Date and time when the company was created

updated_at.description: Date and time when the company was last updated

allOf.description: Optional address. This will become mandatory in the upcoming API version.

first_name.description: First name of the company owner

last_name.description: Last name of the company owner

mobile_phone.description: Optional phone number of the company owner.

ConditionMatchCountry.description: Condition that matches the destination country of the orders

ConditionMatchCategory.description: Condition that matches orders containing specific categories

category_ids.description: List of category IDs based on Category API

ConditionMatchState.description: Condition that matches the destination state of the orders

states.description: List of country ID + state abbr based on State API

ConditionMatchZipcode.description: Condition that matches the destination zipcode of the orders

platform_names.description: List of platform name base on Shipping Rule Platform API.

store_ids.description: List of store IDs base on Store API.

ConditionMatchBuyerSelectedCourierName.description: Condition that matches input courier name. This text is compared to the shipping solution options offered to buyers by your e-commerce store. This condition will not apply if you have setup our Checkout plugin in your store.

buyer_selected_courier_name.description: The courier name is determined and set in your e-commerce store before syncing the order to EasyShip.

ConditionMatchItemsCount.description: Condition that matches order items count

ConditionMatchOperation.description: Condition that matches order's selling price

operator.description: Operator for comparing order's selling price

total_actual_weight.description: LB or KG based on country setting.

order_tag_list.description: Tag names based on Tag API

CountryID.description: Country ID based on Countries API

Currency.description: ISO-4217 three-letter alphabetic currency code (e.g. USD, EUR, GBP)

code.description: A short code that represents the error.

message.description: A human-readable message providing brief information about the error.

details.description: An array of human-readable messages providing detailed information about the error.

request_id.description: An unique ID represent the request.

count.description: The total number of items. The `null` value is used with countless pagination (used for faster response on large datasets, like shipments).

interval.description: Billing frequency of the subscription plan

amount.description: Total amount for the subscription plan

priority.description: The smaller value represent the higher priority. High priority shipping rule would be execute first.

active.description: Turn on or turn off this shipping rule

accessible.description: Based on current subscription plan. Return false if current subscription do not own shipping rule features.

id.description: Condition ID. Can update shipping rule condition.
Action ID. Can update shipping rule action.

recalculate_shipments.description: Recalculate all shipments affected by this shipping rule

priority.description: The smaller value represent the higher priority. High priority shipping rule would be execute first.

recalculate_shipments.description: Recalculate all shipments affected by this shipping rule

priority.description: A smaller value represent higher priority. High priority shipping rule would be execute first.

id.description: Condition ID. Can update shipping rule condition.
Action ID. Can update shipping rule action.

next_invoice_at.description: Next billing date of the subscription

trial_end_at.description: End date of the subscription trial period

next_subscription.description: Next subscription after expiration of the current one

next_invoice_at.description: Next billing date of the subscription

trial_end_at.description: End date of the subscription trial period

url.description: The URL that the user should be redirected to.

easyship_company_id.description: The Easyship Company ID that will be signed in to when the redirect is followed.

expires_at.description: The date and time that the redirect will expire.

value.description: The value that must be provided to these targets: `shipment`: Easyship Shipment ID, `shipment_order`: Easyship Shipment ID.

scope.description: OAuth 2 Scopes separated by space. All Enterprise and Public API scopes are supported, but they must be allowed on the Enterprise API Client Application on the Dashboard.

expires_in.description: OAuth 2 Access Token Expiration Time in Seconds

refresh_token.description: OAuth 2 Refresh Token. Available only for Authorization Code Grant Type.

resource_owner_id.description: OAuth 2 Resource Owner ID. Always `null` when using `client_credentials` grant type.

resource_owner_type.description: OAuth 2 Resource Owner Type. Always `null` when using `client_credentials` grant type.

credit_balance_limit.description: Required only when event_types include `credit_balance_low`. The webhook would be triggered if the credit balance is lower than this limit.

state.description: Webhook state either active, inactive or failed

secret_token.description: Incoming webhook events are signed with `X-EASYSHIP-SIGNATURE` in their headers and contain this token as the value.

updated_at.description: When the webhook was most recently modified

created_at.description: When the webhook was created in the Easyship system recently
